section.label: Profile
section.description: Edit your user details and avatar.

picture.label: {user}'s Profile picture
picture.description: Your profile picture that appears throughout the interface.

section.label: Screen corners
section.description: Customize screen corner rounding and visual effects.

show-corners.label: Show screen corners
show-corners.description: Display rounded corners on the edge of the screen.

solid-black.label: Solid black corners
solid-black.description: Use solid black instead of the bar background color.

radius.label: Screen corners radius
radius.description: Adjust the rounded corners of the screen.

section.label: Fonts
section.description: Choose the fonts used throughout the interface.

default.label: Default font
default.description: Main font used throughout the interface.

scale.label: Default font size
scale.description: Increase or decrease the size of the standard text.

monospace.label: Monospaced font
monospace.description: Monospaced font used for numbers and stats display.

scale.label: Monospaced font size
scale.description: Increase or decrease the size of the monospaced text.

section.label: Language
section.description: Choose your preferred language for the application.

select.label: Application Language
select.description: Select the language used in the application's interface.

section.label: Volumes
section.description: Adjust volume controls and audio levels.

mute-output.label: Mute audio output
mute-output.description: Mute the system's main audio output.

step-size.label: Volume step size
step-size.description: Adjust the step size for volume changes (scroll wheel, keyboard shortcuts).

volume-overdrive.label: Allow volume overdrive
volume-overdrive.description: Allow raising volume above 100%. May not be supported by all hardware.

section.label: Audio devices
section.description: Configure available audio input and output devices.

output-device.label: Output device
output-device.description: Select the desired audio output device.

input-device.label: Input device
input-device.description: Select the desired audio input device.

section.label: Media players
section.description: Set your preferred and ignored media applications.

primary-player.label: Primary player
primary-player.description: Enter a keyword to identify your main player.

excluded-player.label: Excluded player
excluded-player.description: Add keywords for players you want the system to ignore. Each keyword should be on a new line.

visualizer-type.label: Visualization type
visualizer-type.description: Choose a visualization type for media playback

frame-rate.label: Frame rate
frame-rate.description: Higher rates are smoother but use more resources.

scrolling-title.label: Scrolling title
scrolling-title.description: Enable continuous scrolling for long media titles

scrolling-speed.label: Scrolling speed
scrolling-speed.description: Time in seconds for the title to scroll from start to end

section.label: Per-monitor settings
section.description: Adjust settings brightness for each display.

brightness-step.label: Brightness step size
brightness-step.description: Adjust the step size for brightness changes (scroll wheel and keyboard shortcuts).

section.label: Night light
section.description: Reduce blue light emission to help you sleep better and reduce eye strain.

enable.label: Enable night light
enable.description: Apply a warm color filter to reduce blue light emission.

temperature.label: Color temperature
temperature.description: Set the color warmth for nighttime and daytime.

auto-schedule.label: Automatic scheduling
auto-schedule.description: Based on the sunset and sunrise time in {location} - recommended.

manual-schedule.label: Manual scheduling
manual-schedule.description: Set custom times for sunrise and sunset.

force-activation.label: Force activation
force-activation.description: Ignores the schedule and applies the night filter immediately.

section.label: Appearance
section.description: Customize the bar's appearance and position.

position.label: Bar position
position.description: Choose where to place the bar on the screen.

density.label: Bar density
density.description: Adjust the bar's padding for a compact or spacious look.

background-opacity.label: Background opacity
background-opacity.description: Adjust the background opacity of the bar.

floating.label: Floating bar
floating.description: Displays the bar as a floating 'pill'. Note: This will move the screen corners to the edges.

margins.label: Margins
margins.description: Adjust the margins around the floating bar.

section.label: Widgets positioning
section.description: Drag and drop widgets to reorder them. Badges indicate usage: [L]eft, [C]enter, [R]ight.

section.label: Monitors display
section.description: Show bar on specific monitors. Defaults to all if none are chosen.

blacklist.label: Blacklist
blacklist.description: Add tray exclusion rules, supports wildcards (*).

section.label: Appearance
section.description: Customize the dock's behavior and appearance.

floating-distance.label: Dock floating distance
floating-distance.description: Set the distance between the dock and the edge of the screen.

icon-size.label: Dock size
icon-size.description: Adjust the overall size of the dock.

colorize-icons.label: Colorize Icons
colorize-icons.description: Apply theme colors to dock app icons (non-focused apps only).

section.label: Monitor display
section.description: Choose which monitor to display the dock on.

only-same-output.label: Only apps from same output
only-same-output.description: Show only apps from the output where the dock is located.

section.label: Appearance
section.description: Customize the launcher's behavior and appearance.

position.label: Position
position.description: Choose where the launcher panel appears.

background-opacity.label: Background opacity
background-opacity.description: Adjust the background opacity of the launcher.

clipboard-history.label: Enable clipboard history
clipboard-history.description: Access previously copied items from the launcher.

sort-by-usage.label: Sort by most used
sort-by-usage.description: When enabled, frequently launched apps appear first in the list.

use-app2unit.label: Use App2Unit to launch applications
use-app2unit.description: Uses an alternative launch method to better manage app processes and prevent issues.

terminal-command.label: Terminal command
terminal-command.description: Command to launch a terminal. E.g., 'kitty -e' or 'gnome-terminal --'.

section.label: Appearance
section.description: Configure notifications appearance and behavior.

do-not-disturb.label: Do not disturb
do-not-disturb.description: Disable all notification popups when enabled.

enable-osd.label: Enable on screen display
enable-osd.description: Show volume and brightness changes in real-time.

always-on-top.label: Always on top
always-on-top.description: Display notifications above fullscreen windows and other layers.

section.label: Notification duration
section.description: Configure how long notifications stay visible based on their urgency level.

respect-expire.label: Respect expire timeout
respect-expire.description: Use the expire timeout set in the notification.

low-urgency.label: Low urgency
low-urgency.description: How long low priority notifications stay visible.

normal-urgency.label: Normal urgency
normal-urgency.description: How long normal priority notifications stay visible.

critical-urgency.label: Critical urgency
critical-urgency.description: How long critical priority notifications stay visible.

section.label: Monitors display
section.description: Show notification on specific monitors. Defaults to all if none are chosen.

osd.title: On-Screen Display
osd.description: Configure on-screen indicators such as volume and brightness overlays.

general.label: General
general.description: Configure visibility and behavior of OSD.

enabled.label: Enable on screen display
enabled.description: Show volume and brightness changes in real-time.

always-on-top.label: Always on top
always-on-top.description: Display OSD above fullscreen windows and other layers.

section.label: Auto-hide timeout
section.description: How long OSD remains visible before hiding automatically.

auto-hide.label: Auto-hide after
auto-hide.description: Adjust the time before OSD disappears.

section.label: Monitors display
section.description: Show OSD on specific monitors. Defaults to all if none are chosen.

section.label: Wallpaper settings
section.description: Control how wallpapers are managed and displayed.

enable-management.label: Enable wallpaper management
enable-management.description: Manage wallpapers with Noctalia. Uncheck if you prefer using another application.

folder.label: Wallpaper folder
folder.description: Path to your main wallpaper folder.

monitor-specific.label: Monitor-specific directories
monitor-specific.description: Set a different wallpaper folder for each monitor.

fill-mode.label: Fill mode
fill-mode.description: Select how the image should scale to match your monitor's resolution.

fill-color.label: Fill color
fill-color.description: Choose a fill color that may appear behind the wallpaper.

transition-type.label: Transition type
transition-type.description: Animation type when switching between wallpapers.

transition-duration.label: Transition duration
transition-duration.description: Duration of transition animations in seconds.

edge-smoothness.label: Soften transition edge
edge-smoothness.description: Applies a soft, feathered effect to the edge of transitions.

random-wallpaper.label: Random wallpaper
random-wallpaper.description: Schedule random wallpaper changes at regular intervals.

interval.label: Wallpaper interval
interval.description: How often to change wallpapers automatically.

section.label: Color source
section.description: Main settings for Noctalia's colors.

use-wallpaper-colors.label: Use wallpaper colors
use-wallpaper-colors.description: Generate color schemes from your wallpaper using Matugen. Automatically extracts colors to create a cohesive theme.

matugen-scheme-type.label: Matugen scheme type
matugen-scheme-type.description: Choose the color scheme generation algorithm for Matugen.

switch.label: Dark mode
switch.description: Switches to a darker theme for easier viewing at night.

mode.label: Dark mode schedule
mode.description: Enables automatic switching between light and dark mode.

section.label: Predefined color schemes
section.description: Choose from a collection of predefined color schemes.

generate-templates.label: Generate templates for predefined schemes
generate-templates.description: Generate Matugen templates (GTK, terminal themes, etc.) when using predefined color schemes.

section.label: Templates
section.description: Apply colors to external applications.

ui.label: UI
ui.description: Desktop environment and UI toolkit theming.

discord.description-missing: No Discord client detected. Install vencord, vesktop, webcord, armcord, equibop, lightcord, or dorion.

user-templates.label: User templates
user-templates.description: Enable user-defined Matugen config. A template file will be created at ~/.config/noctalia/user-templates.toml on first enable

section.label: Your location
section.description: Get accurate weather and night light scheduling by setting your location.

section.label: Weather
section.description: Choose your preferred temperature unit.

enabled.label: Enable weather
enabled.description: Show weather information throughout the interface and fetch weather data. When disabled, all weather elements will be hidden and no network requests will be made.

fahrenheit.label: Display temperature in Fahrenheit (°F)
fahrenheit.description: Display temperature in Fahrenheit instead of Celsius.

section.label: Date & time
section.description: Customize how date and time appear.

12hour-format.label: Use 12-hour time format
12hour-format.description: On for AM/PM format (e.g., 8:00 PM), off for 24-hour format (e.g., 20:00).

week-numbers.label: Show week numbers
week-numbers.description: Displays the week of the year (e.g., Week 38) in the calendar.

show-events.label: Show calendar events
show-events.description: Display events in the calendar panel.

section.description: Manage Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connections.

section.label: General settings
section.description: Manage screen recording output and content.

output-folder.label: Output folder
output-folder.description: Folder where screen recordings will be saved.

show-cursor.label: Show cursor
show-cursor.description: Record mouse cursor in the video.

section.label: Video settings
section.description: Configure video recording options.

video-source.label: Video source
video-source.description: Portal is recommended, if you get artifacts try Screen.

frame-rate.label: Frame rate
frame-rate.description: Target frame rate for screen recordings.

video-quality.label: Video quality
video-quality.description: Higher quality results in larger file sizes.

video-codec.label: Video codec
video-codec.description: h264 is the most common codec.

color-range.label: Color range
color-range.description: Limited is recommended for better compatibility.

section.label: Audio settings
section.description: Configure audio recording options.

audio-source.label: Audio source
audio-source.description: Audio source to capture during recording.

audio-codec.label: Audio codec
audio-codec.description: Opus is recommended for best performance and smallest audio size.

section.label: Noctalia shell
section.description: A sleek and minimal desktop shell thoughtfully crafted for Wayland, built with Quickshell.

section.label: Contributors
section.description: Shout-out to our {count} awesome contributor!

section.label: System hooks
section.description: Configure commands to be executed when system events occur.

enable.label: Enable hooks
enable.description: Enable or disable all hook commands.

wallpaper-changed.label: Wallpaper changed
wallpaper-changed.description: Command to be executed when wallpaper changes.

theme-changed.label: Theme changed
theme-changed.description: Command to be executed when theme toggles between dark and light mode.

command-info.label: Hook Command Information
command-info.description:
• Commands are executed via shell (sh -c)
• Commands run in background (detached)
• Test buttons execute with current values

parameters.label: Available Parameters
parameters.description:
• Wallpaper Hook: $1 = wallpaper path, $2 = screen name
• Theme Toggle Hook: $1 = true/false (dark mode state)

section.label: Appearance
section.description: Configure the Control Center panel positioning and behavior.

position.label: Position
position.description: Choose where the Control Center panel appears when opened.

section.label: Cards
section.description: Customize which controls appear in the Control Center and in what order.

section.label: Shortcuts widgets
section.description: Configure and manage the shortcuts widgets.

section.label: Appearance
section.description: Customize the look, feel, and behavior of the interface.

tooltips.label: Show tooltips
tooltips.description: Enable or disable tooltips throughout the interface.

scaling.label: Interface scaling
scaling.description: Changes the size of the general user interface, excluding the bar.

dim-desktop.label: Dim desktop
dim-desktop.description: Dim the desktop when panels or menus are open.

border-radius.label: Border radius
border-radius.description: Controls the corner roundness of windows, buttons, and other elements.

animation-disable.label: Disable UI Animations
animation-disable.description: Disable all animations for a faster, more responsive experience.

panels-overlay.label: Open panels in overlay layer
panels-overlay.description: Panels will appear above fullscreen windows

compact-lockscreen.label: Compact lock screen
compact-lockscreen.description: Show only the login input and system controls, hiding weather and media widgets.

lock-on-suspend.label: Lock on suspend
lock-on-suspend.description: Automatically lock the screen when suspending the system.

month.number-no-zero: Month as number without leading zero (1-12)
month.number-leading-zero: Month as number with leading zero (01-12)

rgb.label: RGB values
rgb.description: Adjust red, green, blue, and brightness values.

theme-colors.label: Theme colors
theme-colors.description: Quick access to your theme's color palette.

palette.label: Palette
palette.description: Choose from a wide range of predefined colors.

hide-mode.label: Hiding mode
hide-mode.description: Controls how the widget behaves when no window is active.

show-app-icon.label: Show app icon
show-app-icon.description: Display the application icon next to the window title.

scrolling-mode.label: Scrolling mode
scrolling-mode.description: Control when text scrolling is enabled for long window titles.

max-width.label: Maximum Width
max-width.description: Sets the maximum horizontal size of the widget. The widget will shrink to fit shorter content.

use-fixed-width.label: Use Fixed Width
use-fixed-width.description: When enabled, the widget will always use the maximum width instead of dynamically adjusting to content.

colorize-icons.label: Colorize Icons
colorize-icons.description: Apply theme colors to active window icon.

cpu-temperature.label: CPU temperature
cpu-temperature.description: Show CPU temperature readings if available.

memory-percentage.label: Memory as percentage
memory-percentage.description: Show memory usage as a percentage instead of absolute values.

network-traffic.label: Network traffic
network-traffic.description: Display network upload and download speeds.

show-unread-badge.label: Show unread badge
show-unread-badge.description: Display a badge showing the number of unread notifications.

hide-badge-when-zero.label: Hide badge when zero
hide-badge-when-zero.description: Hide the notification badge when there are no unread notifications.

display-mode.label: Display mode
display-mode.description: Choose how you'd like this value to appear.

low-battery-threshold.label: Low battery warning threshold
low-battery-threshold.description: Show a warning when battery falls below this percentage.

use-distro-logo.label: Use distro logo instead of icon
use-distro-logo.description: Use your distribution's logo instead of a custom icon.

icon.label: Icon
icon.description: Select an icon from the library or a custom file.

display-mode.label: Display mode
display-mode.description: Choose how you'd like this value to appear.

display-mode.label: Display mode
display-mode.description: Choose how you'd like this value to appear.

label-mode.label: Label Mode
label-mode.description: Choose how workspace labels are displayed.

display-mode.label: Display mode
display-mode.description: Choose how you'd like this value to appear.

display-mode.label: Display mode
display-mode.description: Choose how you'd like this value to appear.

icon.label: Icon
icon.description: Select an icon from the library.

left-click.label: Left click
left-click.description: Command to execute when the button is left-clicked.

right-click.label: Right click
right-click.description: Command to execute when the button is right-clicked.

middle-click.label: Middle click
middle-click.description: Command to execute when the button is middle-clicked.

display-command-output.label: Display Command Output
display-command-output.description: Enter a command to run at a regular interval. The first line of its output will be displayed as text.

hide-mode.label: Hiding mode
hide-mode.description: Controls how the widget behaves when no media is playing.

show-album-art.label: Show album art
show-album-art.description: Display the album artwork for the currently playing track.

show-visualizer.label: Show visualizer
show-visualizer.description: Display an audio visualizer when music is playing.

visualizer-type.label: Visualizer type
visualizer-type.description: Choose the style of audio visualizer to display.

max-width.label: Maximum Width
max-width.description: Sets the maximum horizontal size of the widget. The widget will shrink to fit shorter content.

use-fixed-width.label: Use Fixed Width
use-fixed-width.description: When enabled, the widget will always use the maximum width instead of dynamically adjusting to content.

scrolling-mode.label: Scrolling mode
scrolling-mode.description: Control when text scrolling is enabled for long track titles.

use-primary-color.label: Use primary color
use-primary-color.description: When enabled, this applies the primary color for emphasis.

use-monospaced-font.label: Use monospaced font
use-monospaced-font.description: When enabled, the clock will use the monospaced font.

use-custom-font.label: Use custom font
use-custom-font.description: Override the default font selection with a custom font for the clock.

custom-font.label: Custom font
custom-font.description: Select a custom font for the clock display.

clock-display.label: Clock display
clock-display.description: Customize your clock's display by adding tokens from the list below. To use the 12-hour format, you must include the 'AP' token.

horizontal-bar.label: Horizontal bar
horizontal-bar.description: Tip: Use \n to create a line break.

vertical-bar.label: Vertical bar
vertical-bar.description: Use a space to separate each part onto a new line.

hide-mode.label: Hiding mode
hide-mode.description: Controls how the widget behaves when there are no matching windows.

only-active-workspaces.label: Only from active workspaces
only-active-workspaces.description: Show only apps from active workspaces.

only-same-output.label: Only from same output
only-same-output.description: Show only apps from the output where the bar is located.

colorize-icons.label: Colorize Icons
colorize-icons.description: Apply theme colors to taskbar icons.

colorize-icons.label: Colorize Icons
colorize-icons.description: Apply theme colors to tray icons.

panel.title: Notifications
panel.description: Your notifications will show up here as they arrive.

apply-all-monitors.label: Apply to all monitors
apply-all-monitors.description: Apply selected wallpaper to all monitors at once.

wallpaper.configure-directory: Configure your wallpaper directory with images.

panel.title: Bluetooth
panel.enable-message: Enable Bluetooth to see available devices.
panel.pairing-mode: Make sure your device is in pairing mode.

panel.title: Wi-Fi
panel.enable-message: Enable Wi-Fi to see available networks.

tooltips.wallpaper-selector:
Left click: Open wallpaper selector.
Right click: Set random wallpaper.
tooltips.connect-disconnect-devices: Left click to connect. Right click to forget.
tooltips.night-light-disabled:
Night light is disabled.
Left click to cycle mode.
Right click to access settings.
tooltips.night-light-enabled:
Night light is enabled.
Left click to cycle mode.
Right click to access settings.
tooltips.night-light-forced:
Night light is forced.
Left click to cycle mode.
Right click to access settings.
tooltips.night-light-not-installed:
Night light is not available.
wlsunset is not installed.
tooltips.volume-at:
Volume at {volume}%
Left click to toggle mute. Right click for settings.
Scroll to modify volume.
tooltips.microphone-volume-at:
Microphone volume at {volume}%
Left click to toggle mute. Right click for settings.
Scroll to modify volume.
tooltips.open-notification-history-enable-dnd:
Open notification history
Right-click to enable "Do not disturb".
tooltips.open-notification-history-disable-dnd:
Open notification history
Right-click to disable "Do not disturb".

placeholders.enter-command: Enter command to execute (app or custom script)
placeholders.search-launcher: Search entries... or use > for commands

plugins.clipboard-history-disabled-description: Enable clipboard history in settings or install cliphist
plugins.clipboard-clear-description-full: Remove all items from clipboard history

tooltip.action:
Left click: Open notification history
Right click: Toggle Do Not Disturb

Click to cycle Night Light mode
Right click: Open settings

Left click: Open wallpaper selector
Right click: Set random wallpaper
Click to toggle keep awake mode

wallpaper-colors.not-installed: Matugen not installed - required for wallpaper color extraction

recording.failed-general: The recorder exited with an error.
recording.no-portals-desc: Start xdg-desktop-portal and a compositor portal (wlr/hyprland/gnome/kde).
recording.not-installed-desc: Please install gpu-screen-recorder to use screen recording features.

clipboard.unavailable-desc: The 'cliphist' application is not installed. Please install it to use clipboard history features.

ipc.powerpanel-deprecated: PowerPanel has been renamed to SessionMenu, this IPC call will be deprecated soon. Please use "ipc call sessionMenu toggle" instead.
ipc.sidepanel-deprecated: SidePanel has been renamed to ControlCenter, this IPC call will be deprecated soon. Please use "ipc call controlCenter toggle" instead.

kofi.opened: Ko-fi page opened in your browser

do-not-disturb.enabled-desc: You'll find these notifications in your history.

battery.low-desc: Battery is at {percent}%. Please connect the charger.

missing-control-center.label: Last Control Center widget removed
missing-control-center.description: The Control Center widget has been removed from the bar. To access it from the bar again, you will need to re-add the widget. You can open it with right clicking on the bar too.

customize.subheader: Adjust bar position, density, scaling and more.

appearance.subheader: Choose dark mode and color sources (Matugen or predefined).

wallpaper.subheader: Set the mood with a beautiful background.
wallpaper.no-valid: No valid image files found in: {dir}
wallpaper.choose-dir: Choose a directory containing your wallpaper images

dir.label: Wallpaper directory
dir.description: Choose the folder containing your wallpapers

welcome.note: Just a few basics to get you started - full options are in Settings
